snippet: The rapper Future, who has made a name for himself with his mixtapes, is releasing his major-label debut, “Pluto.” SWV and Kat Edmonson also have new albums out.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews albums Pluto by Future and I Missed Us by SMV; Nate Chinen reviews album Way Down Low by Kat Edmonson.

byline.original: By JON CARAMANICA and NATE CHINEN

lead_paragraph: The rapper Future, who has made a name for himself with his mixtapes, is releasing his major-label debut, “Pluto.” SWV and Kat Edmonson also have new albums out.

headline.seo: Future, SWV and Kat Edmonson Release New Albums
headline.main: Future, SWV and Kat Edmonson Release New Albums
